text: Writing late at night? Dark Theme is available from the dropdown menu.
Do you love spreadsheets as much as I do? Probably not, but you can still use Character Sheets! They're a great way to organize data about your characters.
Thought of an awesome one-liner, but afraid you'll forget it? Keep it in your Snippets page.

Use the Relationships tab to keep track of who's related to whom. It's very useful for avoiding your protagonist's in-laws.
